events.message: The client reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 30th, initiating the claim process for damages to the car.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident following verification of incident details provided by the claimant.
An agent was assigned to the case to provide personalized support and manage all further communications regarding the auto accident claim.
Acknowledgement of the claim was sent to the customer along with details about the next steps in the assessment process.
The agent requested accident photos, police report, and vehicle repair estimates to proceed with the investigation of the claim.
Client submitted all requested documentation including police report and detailed vehicle damage photographs for review.
Investigation team began review of the submitted documents and contacted relevant parties for additional information regarding the collision.
The investigation concluded with confirmation of no client negligence and full validation of the collision circumstances.
A settlement offer covering the full estimated repair costs was proposed to the claimant based on the investigation outcome.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement terms and the responsiveness of the claims process so far.
Formal approval was granted for the claim to proceed with payment based on the agreed settlement terms.
Payment was issued to the claimantâ€™s designated account promptly to cover the vehicle repair expenses as per the agreement.
The claim file was officially closed after confirmation of payment receipt and final acceptance by the claimant.
